DataElement.preferredName: Person Prior Antiangiogenesis Therapy Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Ind-2
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator whether a person has had a prior therapeutic regimen that uses synthetic compounds or natural substances to prevent the development of new blood vessels, platelets, and or fibroblasts, as an element of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Prior Antiangiogenesis Therapy Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a person having had a prior therapeutic regimen that uses synthetic compounds or natural substances to prevent the development of new blood vessels, platelets, and or fibroblasts, as an element of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Property.preferredName: Prior Antiangiogenesis Therapy Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:A therapeutic regimen that uses synthetic compounds or natural substances to prevent the development of new blood vessels.:Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: A therapeutic regimen that uses synthetic compounds or natural substances to prevent the development of new blood vessels.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has the patient had prior the
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient had prior therapy with Brivanib or anti-vascular, anti-PDGFR (platelet-derived growth factor receptor) or anti-FGFR (fibroblast growth factor receptor) therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient currently receiving or has she been treated previously with AMG 386, or other molecules that inhibit the angiopoietins or Tie2 receptor?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received prior therapy with BIBF1120?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received Bevacizumab for management of primary disease?

ReferenceDocuments.name: eligibility question
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received a prior anti-angiogenic agent in the recurrent setting?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient have prior treatment with bevacizumab (or any other anti vascular therapy, e.g., cediranib) for platinum resistant recurrence

DataElement.changeDescription: Replaced VD Eligibility Ind-2 2018257v1 with VD ID#3506068 - Yes No Indicator - dbw
